tasks.title: Knuckle Down
tasks.description: I currently have 4 windows open up… and I don’t know why.

tasks.title: Heads Up
tasks.description: I often see the time 11:11 or 12:34 on clocks.

tasks.title: Quick On the Draw
tasks.description: The lake is a long way from here.

tasks.title: Beating a Dead Horse
tasks.description: Don't step on the broken glass.

tasks.title: What Goes Up Must Come Down
tasks.description: Rock music approaches at high velocity.

tasks.title: Wild Goose Chase
tasks.description: We need to rent a room for our party.

tasks.title: Down To Earth
tasks.description: He didn’t want to go to the dentist, yet he went anyway.

tasks.title: A Piece of Cake
tasks.description: My Mum tries to be cool by saying that she likes all the same things that I do.

tasks.title: Like Father Like Son
tasks.description: What was the person thinking when they discovered cow’s milk was fine for human consumption… and why did they do it in the first place!?

tasks.title: Drawing a Blank
tasks.description: When I was little I had a car door slammed shut on my hand. I still remember it quite vividly.
